name: updateCustomFieldOption
description:
Updates the options of a custom field.

If any of the options are not found, no options are updated. Options where the values in the request match the current values aren't updated and aren't reported in the response.

Note that this operation **only works for issue field select list options created in Jira or using operations from the [Issue custom field options](#api-group-Issue-custom-field-options) resource**, it cannot be used with issue field select list options created by Connect apps.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

fieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

BulkCustomFieldOptionUpdateRequest.description: Details of the options to update for a custom field.

options.description: Details of the options to update.

CustomFieldOptionUpdate.description: Details of a custom field option for a context.

id.description: The ID of the custom field option.

value.description: The value of the custom field option.

$block: A list of custom field options for a context.
